name: Flex Jumper
description:
Flex Jumper is a 2D Survival Shooter which was inspired by the Call of Duty Zombie Mode, just in 2D with other parts! Play as a Flex Soldier and try to survive so many rounds as you can! And now with a GameJolt integration! (Recommend)Flex Jumper is a 2D Survival Shooter in the SPACE! Play as a FLEX Soldier and kill the Evil Aliens to survive!

Try the new Rush Mode where you need to kill enemies to get to the next weapon!
Or play the Nexus Mode, try to protect the Nexus and you with Skills and weapons you got!
Or just play the Survival Mode, try to survive so long as you can!

You have a shop where you can buy items that you will need in the fight against the aliens! And try to unlock every achievement and Skin!
If you want your skin in my game, just send me a message, i gonna try to add it!

MOVEMENT

  • Move mit A/D or with your Arrow Keys
  • Press Space to Jump
  • Press Q to open the Weapon Panel
  • Press G to throw a grenade
  • Press X to open the shop
  • Press 1,2 or 3 to use your skills!(Only in Nexus Mode)

The game is in development yet. I would be happy if you leave your feedback! Thanks for playing and have fun <3
BTW. In this version of the game we got a bug. I forget it to fix it. So the Coins is falling through the walls.

Current Version: 1.7
